metadata.name: Early Supporter Badge - OGCL
metadata.description:
This NFT is available for all early supporters of joincircle who were added to the Circle List. 

Please note, joincircle has now rebranded to Anokha. These NFTs will still play a role in our new and even more vibrant ecosystem.

If you missed out on this edition, stay engaged on Twitter because there will be more opportunities coming! Circle List reopens on September 11th, 2022.
